Dear Parents,

You are warmly invited to a tour of the LFIB. This visit is organised by the parents at the beginning of each new school year. This year it will take place on Thursday 30th August 2018 from 09.45 to noon. Our future students will of course be most welcome too! This visit will be conducted in French, English and Thai.

Please feel free to contact the following volunteers should you have questions relating to this visit : Mrs. St√©phanie Zoccola (zoccola_s@yahoo.fr), Mr. Henri de Reboul (dereboul@yahoo.com), or Mrs. Ruthairat Dauguet (communication@lfib.ac.th).

Sincerely yours,
